alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cumberland; Coastal York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 20 at 2:21PM EST until January 21 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO NOON EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Localized minor flooding and splash over is possible at the time of high tide late Saturday morning. * WHERE...In Maine, Coastal York and Coastal Cumberland Counties. In New Hampshire, Coastal Rockingham County. * WHEN...From 9 AM to noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures is expected. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Seavey Island / Portsmouth NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 12.5 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.7 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 4.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 20/10 PM 9.2 0.4 1.3 4-5 None 21/10 AM 10.7 1.9 0.9 4 None 21/11 PM 8.9 0.1 0.6 3 None 22/11 AM 10.3 1.5 0.2 2 None 23/12 AM 9.0 0.2 0.4 3 None 23/12 PM 10.2 1.4 0.1 3-4 None Hampton Harbor NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 20/10 PM 9.6 0.1 1.3 5 None 21/10 AM 11.1 1.6 0.9 4 Minor 21/11 PM 9.3 -0.2 0.6 3 None 22/11 AM 10.7 1.2 0.2 2 None 23/12 AM 9.4 -0.1 0.4 3 None 23/12 PM 10.6 1.1 0.1 3-4 None Portland ME MLLW Categories - Minor 12.0 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 14.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 20/10 PM 10.5 0.8 1.4 3-4 None 21/10 AM 12.2 2.5 1.0 3-4 Minor 21/11 PM 10.4 0.7 0.8 2-3 None 22/11 AM 11.8 2.1 0.3 2 None 23/12 AM 10.4 0.7 0.5 2-3 None 23/12 PM 11.7 2.0 0.2 3 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
